questions.question: What is the Prototype Pattern also known as?
Who introduced the Prototype Pattern in software development?
In what year was the Prototype Pattern extensively described by Coplien?
What is the purpose of the Prototype Registry?
questions.answer: To hold a collection of pre-defined prototype objects

questions.question: What are the two ways to implement the clone method in the Prototype Pattern?
questions.answer: Using the Cloneable interface or a custom clone method
